text: Every CNF formula has an equivalent depth-2 circuit.

Algorithm Design, Kleinberg-Tardos, Theorem 8.8, page 460. (For every clause k, create i vertices if there are i variables in the clause. Draw an edge between all vertices of a clause and an edge between complementary vertices across clauses.)
In a graph (V, E), S is a vertex cover iff V-S is an independent set.
S is an independent set in graph G iff S is a clique in the complement of G.
